purpose: Deterministic issuance policy envelope consumed by the Near-Intersect factory. Non-executable. Defines parameters and constraints for token deployment.

treasury_policy.notes: Splits are defined at genesis allocation time. Execution mechanics are implemented in Near-Intersect token templates.

burn_policy.notes: Burn executor cadence is a policy constraint; implementation is contract-side.

savings_policy.notes: Deterministic time-lock schedule: every 2 years on Nov 22 funds unlock for 7 days, then relock; 8 cycles total.

airdrop_policy.notes: Airdrop targets are derived from a top-US-markets oracle with an off-chain feeder.

governance_policy.notes: Governance wrapper/checksum constraints to ensure parameter integrity.

integrity.intent: Factory must reject deployments that attempt to override immutable_fields.
